entry.title: Etsy Scraper
entry.summary: Scrapes product data from Etsy for analysis
entry.content:
Extract product data from Etsy, cleans, and stores into a CSV file for analysis.

The implementation has been designed with future extensions in mind to include additional sites. Includes solid features such as the storing of CSS selectors for data alongside lambda testing functions for that data.

Package design allows implementation inside a simple CLI application (provided in source) or integrating into full web application (see demo).

entry.title: Send To Kindle
entry.summary: gRPC microservices to convert and send webpages to a Kindle
entry.content: Simple Flask REST API with beautifully crafted gRPC microservice architecture that takes the URL of a web page, finds the main article text, converts it to an ebook, and emails to a Kindle email address. I created endpoints to accept a URL or the actual HTML to send to the Kindle. The later endpoint supports sites with logins, popups or attempts to catch scraping tools and integrates Readability JS to identify main page content.
